name: Epitaph (itch) (PlutoniumGames, KumashovComposer, angients)
description:
The recent storm broke some tombstones! You are contacted by the city mayor to repair them. Without their tombs the ghosts will forget who they are and what they love. You must contact the ghosts and rebuild their tombstones. Little did you know they have created a new ghostly community.

Controls:

  • Click to pick up the puzzle pieces and trinkets and drag them to complete the puzzle
  • Get reactions from the ghosts when you show them a trinket!
  • Blue and green arrows to change ghost (must go through all dialogue first)
  • Esc to pause the game.
